value: Opening Wedge Osteotomy for Distal Radius Malunion: Dorsal or Palmar Approach?
Dorsal approach with trapezoidal graft and mini-fragment plate; Palmar approach with fixed-angle plate and cancellous bone chips
comment: The study compared dorsal and palmar approach techniques.

value: This study compared dorsal and palmar approaches for distal radius malunion osteotomy. Both methods effectively corrected malunions. Palmar approach resulted in better wrist flexion and less hardware removal.
comment: Inferred from the abstract to meet the 30-word limit as findings are not summarized.
